sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Isaac Chinagorom bụ ọgbaegwu riteere Naịjirịa nturu ugo n'asọmpi mbaụwa e mere na London n'afọ 1984.
Ihe a kpọrọ asọmpi a bụ 'Malibu World Dancing Championship'.
Dịka Mazi Isaac Chinagorom siri kọọrọ BBC Igbo, ọ bụ Muhammadu Buhari bụ ọchịagha na-achị Naịjirịa n'oge ọ gara asọmpi ahụ.
O kwuru na Buhari kwere ya nkwa na ọ gaa turu ugo lọta, na gọọmentị ga-enye ya ụlọ iji jaa ya mma.
Lee nwagbọghọ ji otu ụkwụ agba egwu
Ihe mere m ji agba egwu ma m na-arụ ọrụ 'traffic' - Ifedioramma Chizoba
'Oyiyi m yiri Michael Jackson mere ka m gbawa egwu ka ya' - African Michael Jackson
Lee nwata nwoke ahụ na-agba 'Ballet' wuru ewu na soshal Midia
Ọ gara ya bụ asọmpi ma gbaa onye nke atọ n'ime mmadụ iri isii (60).
Mana oteghị aka ọ lọtara, a chụpụ Buhari n'ọkwa ọchịagha.
Ugbua Buhari bụụr onyeisiala Naịjirịa ọzọ, Isaac Chinagorom na-arịọ ka o mezuo nkwa ahụ o kwere ya, afọ iri atọ na asaa gara aga.
Onye mere akụkọ a bụ Chiemela Mgbeahuru.
Ụmụntoroọbịa
Imo steeti
Ịkpa obi aṅụrị
Muhammadu Buhari
